titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Wisconsin. Governor (1979-1983: Dreyfus): Constituent Correspondence, 1978-1982

profiledesc.creation: Text converted and initial EAD tagging done with an in-house template, July, 2012.

physloc.extref: See the catalog entry for information on possible additional materials and shelf locations.

did.abstract: Incoming letters, copies of replies, inter-office memoranda concerning the inquiry, and face sheets showing office routing and other administrative information. Includes Index to Constituent Correspondence--a computer printout produced by the Dept. of Administration from data entered by the Office's word processing section showing name of correspondent, subject of correspondence, date of receipt, date of reply, and staff member who handled the inquiry.

note.p: These records have been assigned Series 3018.

p.extref: See the Agency History in the catalog.

arrangement.p: This collection was received in multiple parts from the donor(s) and is organized into 11 major parts. These materials have not been physically interfiled and researchers might need to consult more than one part to locate similar materials.

scopecontent.p: Constituent correspondence addressed to Governor Lee Sherman Dreyfus, 1980-1982, arranged by numerical code. Included are incoming letters, copies of replies, inter-office memoranda concerning the inquiry, and face sheets showing office routing and other administrative information.

Constituent correspondence, 1981, addressed to Governor Dreyfus. The majority of the accession are letters from school children requesting materials such as maps, state symbols, and photos of Dreyfus for reports and personal collections. Also included are requests for state reports and publications to be sent to libraries and professional groups and general letters of support for the governor.
Indexes to constituent correspondence, 1979-1982. Correspondence is indexed alphabetically and by sender, and for 1979-1981 by subject.

Legal and policy correspondence, 1981, sent to the Governor's office or passed on through state representatives. A few of the topics covered include retirement systems, alcohol and drug abuse, and environmental concerns.

did.physdesc: 1.4 c.f. (1 record center carton and 1 archives box)

scopecontent.p: Children's letters and correspondence related to AB 621 legislation which would prohibit abortion in public hospitals, 1981-1982.
Alphabetical index to the 1980 constituent correspondence.

did.physdesc: 19.4 c.f. (19 record center cartons and 1 archives box)

scopecontent.p: Constituent correspondence to and from Governor Lee Sherman Dreyfus, 1979-1982. A portion of the accession is arranged numerically by code, there is an index in box 20. There is also correspondence arranged alphabetically, and state and federal agency correspondence. Included are incoming letters, copies of replies, and inter-office memoranda concerning the inquiry.

did.physdesc: 29.6 c.f. (29 record center cartons and 2 archives boxes)

scopecontent.p: Constituent correspondence to Governor Dreyfus for 1979 and 1982. Files are arranged numerically by code. Included are incoming letters, copies of replies, inter-office memoranda concerning the inquiry, and face sheets showing office routing and other administrative information.

Constituent correspondence to Governor Dreyfus for 1978-1980. Files are arranged numerically by code. Included are incoming letters, copies of replies, inter-office memoranda concerning the inquiry, and face sheets showing office routing and other administrative information. There is also a small amount of legal policy correspondence.
Constituent correspondence to Governor Dreyfus during the 1978 campaign regarding debates and his position on various issues.

Constituent correspondence addressed to Governor Lee Sherman Dreyfus, 1979-1980, arranged by numerical code. Included are incoming letters, copies of replies, inter-office memoranda concerning the inquiry, and face sheets showing office routing and other administrative information.
